Text:
Any chance to make a request SaM? 
"Trouble with the Curve" if you could please.
Looking for a version that has hard coded English subs.  Half the movie is in Italian.  Does this one have them?

COSTNER.....READ THE BLOODY THING:

Language        :   English                       
Subtitles       :   English for non English parts

He wasn't asking if they were there, he was asking if they were embedded in the AVI, just in a separate srt, or actually hard coded. This matters, as some set top boxes don't support embedded or srt subs.
